articles.description: Bleacher Report does not have high expectations for Kadarius Toney in 2022, suggesting he will be the New York Giants’ biggest bust.
articles.content: Bleacher Report released a list of the one player most likely to be a bust in 2022 for each NFL team. 32 players were chosen for this list, and, for the New York Giants, they selected Kadarius Toney.… [+1716 chars]
